name: subatic
description: Subatic is a self-hosted platform for managing anime and media subscriptions, tracking episodes, and organizing watchlists in a simple dashboard.

features.title: Anime Tracking
features.description: Monitors anime series and episodes for watching

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Tracks which streaming services have specific shows

features.title: Watchlist
features.description: Creates lists of anime to watch with priority ordering

features.title: Episode Tracking
features.description: Marks episodes as watched and tracks progress

features.title: Release Calendar
features.description: Shows upcoming episode releases for followed series

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Finds anime by title, genre, or studio

features.title: Recommendation Engine
features.description: Suggests similar anime based on preferences

features.title: Status Tracking
features.description: Marks series as watching, completed, or plan to watch
